patthana17.24:1.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:2.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:3.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:4.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
